short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PPS's bathroom status extension, improving student's lives since 1996.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PPS Bathrooms allows students at PPS schools find open bathrooms. PPS Bathrooms currently covers Cleveland, Franklin, and Ida B Wells High Schools. 

Each bathroom has an indicator next to it showing if it is either open, green, or closed, red. 

You will choose a school when you first open this extension, you can change this through the settings.

This extension and ppsbathrooms is not associated with Portland Public Schools.
